message:
Hello Everybody, I need some help from an Expert Ubuntu Web Server administrator to help me optimize my DigitalOcean droplet performance any recommendations?

Droplet specs:
2 Core processor
2 GB memory 
40 GB SSD

## Server Environment ##

Server Info:              Apache/2.4.20 (Ubuntu)
Default Timezone:         UTC
MySQL Version:            5.5.52-0ubuntu0.14.04.1

Running 2 WordPress websites

-- PHP Configuration
PHP Version:              7.0.9-1+deb.sury.org~trusty+1
PHP Post Max Size:        32M
PHP Time Limit:           30
PHP Max Input Vars:       1000
PHP Safe Mode:            No
PHP Memory Limit:         128M
PHP Upload Max Size:      24M
PHP Upload Max Filesize:  24M
PHP Allow URL File Open:  Yes

Thanks

data.message: انت بتستخدم اى نوع ن انواع السيرفرات (اباتشى و لا انجن اكس و لا لايت سبيد)
انا لست هذا الخبير، لكن على كل حال مبدأيا عدل الموضوع واذكر خواص ال droplet الي انت شغال بيها.
You need me to do it for you or tell you how to do it... both are fine btw
Use nginx instead of Apache and use cloud flare

- use nginx + php-fpm
- config fpm to be scalable
- optimize your MySQL threads
- use redis
- use opcache
- use fcgi cache from nginx
there are more and more you can do based on your requirements .
---
I have a client with droplet just like yours and runs more than 4 sites with no performance problems .
